title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         A visit to our memorial on Duane Street is a highlight for visitors to our site   Make the most of your visit to the African Burial Ground National Monument. The stories of the African Burial Ground teach us how free and enslaved Africans contributed to the physical and spiritual development of Lower Manhattan during the 17th and 18th centuries. There are many different activities to participate in, things to do, and history to explore at the African Burial Ground National Monument.
